column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I came here wanting to try something new and wow was this great. This place offers a variety of entrees with a twist to them
column2: but it makes it taste so much better
column3: the ambience of the place was awesome
column4: the music wasn't too soft or too loud
column6: Terry was funny and took care of us. 10/10 I'm definitely coming back here regularly.
